title: Calculate Square Root of a Complex Number
description: This function computes the square root of a given complex number. It takes a complex number as input and returns its square root as a complex number, handling both real and imaginary components appropriately.
name: CSQRT

input.name: X
input.description: The complex number for which the square root needs to be calculated.

output.name: CSQRT
output.description: The computed square root of the input complex number.

return_value.description: The square root of the input complex number returned by the function.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the square root of the complex number.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the square root of the complex number.
